name: pippi
detail: pippi, stylized with a lowercase "p", is the osu!standard mascot that joined on 2008-07. She is also known as pippidon in osu!taiko and appeared in Yandere Simulator as an NPC. The initial concept art was created by Sarumaru, the pippidon sprite was created by crystalsuicune, and the current art was designed by Daru.
